en-US.summary: An unofficial audio streaming interface for your Plex music libraries
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell media center to play 'Uptown Girl'
Alexa, ask media center for something by Adele
Alexa, tell media center to play some Jazz music
en-US.name: Audio Streaming Media Center
en-US.description: An unofficial audio streaming interface for your Plex music libraries
